00009 void CallAvailableEnemiesTo( INT16 sGridNo )
00010 {
00011       INT32 iLoop;
00012       INT32 iLoop2;
00013       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
00014 
00015       // All enemy teams become aware of a very important "noise" coming from here!
00016       for (iLoop = 0; iLoop < LAST_TEAM; iLoop++)
00017       {
00018             // if this team is active
00019             if (gTacticalStatus.Team[iLoop].bTeamActive)
00020             {
00021                   // if this team is computer-controlled, and isn't the CIVILIAN "team"
00022                   if (!(gTacticalStatus.Team[iLoop].bHuman) && (iLoop != CIV_TEAM))
00023                   {
00024                         // make this team (publicly) aware of the "noise"
00025                         gsPublicNoiseGridno[iLoop] = sGridNo;
00026                         gubPublicNoiseVolume[iLoop] = MAX_MISC_NOISE_DURATION;
00027 
00028                         // new situation for everyone;
00029                         iLoop2 = gTacticalStatus.Team[ iLoop ].bFirstID;
00030                         for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[iLoop2]; iLoop2 <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ iLoop ].bLastID; iLoop2++, pSoldier++ )
00031                         {
00032                               if (pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE)
00033                               {
00034                                     SetNewSituation( pSoldier );
00035                                     WearGasMaskIfAvailable( pSoldier );
00036                               }
00037                         }
00038  
00039                   }
00040 
00041             }
00042 
00043       }
00044 }

00077 void CallAvailableKingpinMenTo( INT16 sGridNo )
00078 {
00079       // like call all enemies, but only affects civgroup KINGPIN guys with 
00080       // NO PROFILE
00081 
00082       INT32 iLoop2;
00083       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;

00088       {
00089             // make this team (publicly) aware of the "noise"
00090             gsPublicNoiseGridno[CIV_TEAM] = sGridNo;

00092 
00093             // new situation for everyone...

00099                   {
00100                         SetNewSituation( pSoldier );
00101                   }
00102             }
00103       }

00106 void CallEldinTo( INT16 sGridNo )
00107 {
00108       // like call all enemies, but only affects Eldin
00109       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
00110 
00111       // Eldin becomes aware of a very important "noise" coming from here!
00112       // So long as he hasn't already heard a noise a sec ago...
00113       if (gTacticalStatus.Team[CIV_TEAM].bTeamActive)
00114       {
00115             // new situation for Eldin
00116             pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ELDIN, FALSE );
00117             if ( pSoldier && pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && (pSoldier->bAlertStatus == STATUS_GREEN || pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume < (MAX_MISC_NOISE_DURATION / 2) ) )
00118             {
00119                   if ( SoldierToLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, sGridNo, (UINT8) MaxDistanceVisible(), TRUE ) )
00120                   {
00121                         // sees the player now!
00122                         TriggerNPCWithIHateYouQuote( ELDIN );
00123                         SetNewSituation( pSoldier );
00124                   }
00125                   else
00126                   {
00127                         pSoldier->sNoiseGridno = sGridNo;
00128                         pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume = MAX_MISC_NOISE_DURATION;
00129                         pSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_RED;
00130                         if ( (pSoldier->bAction != AI_ACTION_GET_CLOSER) || CheckFact( FACT_MUSEUM_ALARM_WENT_OFF, 0 ) == FALSE )
00131                         {
00132                               CancelAIAction( pSoldier, TRUE );
00133                               pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_GET_CLOSER;
00134                               pSoldier->usNextActionData = sGridNo;
00135                               RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->AICounter, 100 );
00136                         }
00137                         // otherwise let AI handle this normally
00138 //                      SetNewSituation( pSoldier );
00139                         // reduce any delay to minimal
00140                   }
00141                   SetFactTrue( FACT_MUSEUM_ALARM_WENT_OFF );
00142             }
00143       }
00144 }

00147 INT16 MostImportantNoiseHeard( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 *piRetValue, BOOLEAN * pfClimbingNecessary, BOOLEAN * pfReachable )
00148 {
00149       UINT32 uiLoop;
00150       INT8 * pbPersOL, * pbPublOL;
00151       INT16 *psLastLoc,*psNoiseGridNo;
00152       INT8 * pbNoiseLevel;
00153       INT8 *pbLastLevel;
00154       UINT8 *pubNoiseVolume;
00155       INT32 iDistAway;
00156       INT32 iNoiseValue, iBestValue = -10000;
00157       INT16 sBestGridNo = NOWHERE;
00158       INT8  bBestLevel = 0;
00159       INT16 sClimbingGridNo;
00160       BOOLEAN fClimbingNecessary = FALSE;
00161       SOLDIERTYPE * pTemp;    
00162 
00163       pubNoiseVolume = &gubPublicNoiseVolume[pSoldier->bTeam];
00164       psNoiseGridNo = &gsPublicNoiseGridno[pSoldier->bTeam];
00165       pbNoiseLevel = &gbPublicNoiseLevel[pSoldier->bTeam];
00166 
00167       psLastLoc = gsLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->ubID];
00168 
00169       // hang pointers at start of this guy's personal and public opponent opplists
00170       pbPersOL = pSoldier->bOppList;
00171       pbPublOL = gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam];
00172 
00173       // look through this man's personal & public opplists for opponents heard
00174       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
00175       {
00176             pTemp = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
00177 
00178             // if this merc is inactive, at base, on assignment, or dead
00179             if (!pTemp || !pTemp->bLife)
00180                   continue;          // next merc
00181 
00182             // if this merc is neutral/on same side, he's not an opponent
00183             if ( CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pTemp ) || (pSoldier->bSide == pTemp->bSide))
00184                   continue;          // next merc
00185 
00186             pbPersOL = pSoldier->bOppList + pTemp->ubID;
00187             pbPublOL = gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam] + pTemp->ubID;
00188             psLastLoc = gsLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->ubID] + pTemp->ubID;
00189             pbLastLevel = gbLastKnownOppLevel[pSoldier->ubID] + pTemp->ubID;
00190 
00191             // if this guy's been personally heard within last 3 turns
00192             if (*pbPersOL < NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN)
00193             {
00194                   // calculate how far this noise was, and its relative "importance"
00195                   iDistAway = SpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,*psLastLoc);
00196                   iNoiseValue = (*pbPersOL) * iDistAway;               // always a negative number!
00197 
00198                   if (iNoiseValue > iBestValue)
00199                   {
00200                         iBestValue = iNoiseValue;
00201                         sBestGridNo = *psLastLoc;
00202                         bBestLevel = *pbLastLevel;
00203                   }
00204             }
00205 
00206             // if this guy's been publicly heard within last 3 turns
00207             if (*pbPublOL < NOT_HEARD_OR_SEEN)
00208             {
00209                   // calculate how far this noise was, and its relative "importance"
00210                   iDistAway = SpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,gsPublicLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->bTeam][pTemp->ubID]);
00211                   iNoiseValue = (*pbPublOL) * iDistAway;               // always a negative number!
00212 
00213                   if (iNoiseValue > iBestValue)
00214                   {
00215                         iBestValue = iNoiseValue;
00216                         sBestGridNo = gsPublicLastKnownOppLoc[pSoldier->bTeam][pTemp->ubID];
00217                         bBestLevel = gbPublicLastKnownOppLevel[pSoldier->bTeam][pTemp->ubID];
00218                   }
00219             }
00220 
00221       }
00222 
00223       // if any "misc. noise" was also heard recently
00224       if (pSoldier->sNoiseGridno != NOWHERE)
00225       {
00226             if ( pSoldier->bNoiseLevel != pSoldier->bLevel || PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->sNoiseGridno ) >= 6 || SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, pSoldier->sNoiseGridno, pSoldier->bNoiseLevel, 0, (UINT8) MaxDistanceVisible(), FALSE ) == 0 )
00227             {
00228                   // calculate how far this noise was, and its relative "importance"
00229                   iDistAway = SpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,pSoldier->sNoiseGridno);
00230                   iNoiseValue = ((pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume / 2) - 6) * iDistAway;
00231 
00232                   if (iNoiseValue > iBestValue)
00233                   {
00234                         iBestValue = iNoiseValue;
00235                         sBestGridNo = pSoldier->sNoiseGridno;
00236                         bBestLevel = pSoldier->bNoiseLevel;
00237                   }
00238             }
00239             else
00240             {
00241                   // we are there or near
00242                   pSoldier->sNoiseGridno = NOWHERE;        // wipe it out, not useful anymore
00243                   pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume = 0;
00244             }
00245       }
00246 
00247 
00248       // if any recent PUBLIC "misc. noise" is also known
00249       if ( (pSoldier->bTeam != CIV_TEAM) || ( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP ) )
00250       {
00251       
00252             if (*psNoiseGridNo != NOWHERE)
00253             {
00254                   // if we are NOT there (at the noise gridno)
00255                   if ( *pbNoiseLevel != pSoldier->bLevel || PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, *psNoiseGridNo ) >= 6 || SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, *psNoiseGridNo, *pbNoiseLevel, 0, (UINT8) MaxDistanceVisible(), FALSE ) == 0 )
00256                   {
00257                         // calculate how far this noise was, and its relative "importance"
00258                         iDistAway = SpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,*psNoiseGridNo);
00259                         iNoiseValue = ((*pubNoiseVolume / 2) - 6) * iDistAway;
00260 
00261                         if (iNoiseValue > iBestValue)
00262                         {
00263                               iBestValue = iNoiseValue;
00264                               sBestGridNo = *psNoiseGridNo;
00265                               bBestLevel = *pbNoiseLevel;
00266                         }
00267                   }
00268             }
00269 
00270       }
00271 
00272       if (sBestGridNo != NOWHERE && pfReachable )
00273       {
00274             *pfReachable = TRUE;
00275 
00276             // make civs not walk to noises outside their room if on close patrol/onguard
00277             if ( pSoldier->bOrders <= CLOSEPATROL && (pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM || pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE ) )
00278             {
00279                   UINT8 ubRoom, ubNewRoom;
00280 
00281                   // any other combo uses the default of ubRoom == 0, set above
00282                   if ( InARoom( pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[0], &ubRoom ) )
00283                   {
00284                         if ( !InARoom( pSoldier->usPatrolGrid[0], &ubNewRoom ) || ubRoom != ubNewRoom )
00285                         {
00286                               *pfReachable = FALSE;
00287                         }
00288                   }
00289             }
00290 
00291             if ( *pfReachable )
00292             {
00293                   // if there is a climb involved then we should store the location 
00294                   // of where we have to climb to instead
00295                   sClimbingGridNo = GetInterveningClimbingLocation( pSoldier, sBestGridNo, bBestLevel, &fClimbingNecessary );
00296                   if ( fClimbingNecessary )
00297                   {
00298                         if ( sClimbingGridNo == NOWHERE )
00299                         {
00300                               // can't investigate!
00301                               *pfReachable = FALSE;
00302                         }
00303                         else
00304                         {
00305                               sBestGridNo = sClimbingGridNo;
00306                               fClimbingNecessary = TRUE;
00307                         }
00308                   }
00309                   else
00310                   {
00311                         fClimbingNecessary = FALSE;
00312                   } 
00313             }
00314       }
00315 
00316       if ( piRetValue )
00317       {
00318             *piRetValue = iBestValue;
00319       }
00320 
00321       if ( pfClimbingNecessary )
00322       {
00323             *pfClimbingNecessary = fClimbingNecessary;
00324       }
00325 
00326 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00327       if (sBestGridNo != NOWHERE)
00328             AINumMessage("MOST IMPORTANT NOISE HEARD FROM GRID #",sBestGridNo);
00329 #endif
00330 
00331       return(sBestGridNo);
00332 }

00334 
00335 INT16 WhatIKnowThatPublicDont(SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubInSightOnly)
00336 {
00337       UINT8 ubTotal = 0;
00338       UINT32 uiLoop;
00339       INT8 *pbPersOL,*pbPublOL;
00340       SOLDIERTYPE * pTemp;
00341 
00342       // if merc knows of a more important misc. noise than his team does
00343       if (!(CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier )) && (pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume > gubPublicNoiseVolume[pSoldier->bTeam]))
00344       {
00345             // the difference in volume is added to the "new info" total
00346             ubTotal += pSoldier->ubNoiseVolume - gubPublicNoiseVolume[pSoldier->bTeam];
00347       }
00348 
00349       // hang pointers at start of this guy's personal and public opponent opplists
00350       pbPersOL = &(pSoldier->bOppList[0]);
00351       pbPublOL = &(gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam][0]);
00352 
00353       // for every opponent
00354 //    for (iLoop = 0; iLoop < MAXMERCS; iLoop++,pbPersOL++,pbPublOL++)
00355 //    {
00356 //    pTemp = &(Menptr[iLoop]);
00357 
00358 
00359       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
00360       {
00361             pTemp = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
00362       
00363             // if this merc is inactive, at base, on assignment, or dead
00364             if (!pTemp)
00365             {
00366                   continue;          // next merc
00367             }
00368 
00369             // if this merc is neutral/on same side, he's not an opponent
00370             if ( CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pTemp ) || (pSoldier->bSide == pTemp->bSide))
00371             {
00372                   continue;          // next merc
00373             }
00374 
00375             pbPersOL = pSoldier->bOppList + pTemp->ubID;
00376             pbPublOL = gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam] + pTemp->ubID;
00377 
00378 
00379             // if we're only interested in guys currently is sight, and he's not
00380             if (ubInSightOnly)
00381             {
00382                   if ((*pbPersOL == SEEN_CURRENTLY) && (*pbPublOL != SEEN_CURRENTLY))
00383                   {
00384                         // just count the number of them
00385                         ubTotal++;
00386                   }
00387             }
00388             else
00389             {
00390                   // add value of personal knowledge compared to public knowledge to total
00391                   ubTotal += gubKnowledgeValue[*pbPublOL - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE][*pbPersOL - OLDEST_HEARD_VALUE];
00392             }
00393       }
00394 
00395 #ifdef DEBUGDECISIONS
00396       if (ubTotal > 0)
00397       {
00398             AINumMessage("WHAT I KNOW THAT PUBLIC DON'T = ",ubTotal);
00399       }
00400 #endif
00401 
00402       return(ubTotal);
00403 }
